props.contain: Applies **background-size: contain** to the background image (when using the **img** prop).
props.hover: Will apply an elevation of 4dp when hovered (default 2dp). You can find more information on the [elevation page](/styles/elevation).
props.img: Specifies an image background for the card. For more advanced implementations, it is recommended that you use the [v-img](/components/images) component. You can find a [v-img example here](/components/cards/#media-with-text).
props.raised: Specifies a higher default elevation (8dp). You can find more information on the [elevation page](/styles/elevation).

events.click: Emitted when component is clicked - Will trigger component to ripple when clicked unless the `.native` modifier is used
